content.rendered:
The BoxSafe Medical Course is merely a refresher for ring side doctors and other members of the medical team. Please note all content is as a resource, however, it should not be taken as worthy of a medical certificate. Specific league rules and regulations may override statements mentioned in this course.

Ring Side Doctor Duties Medical Checks Neutral Corner Evaluations Down Boxer Management Post-Bout Examination
